description: When attempting to plot a graph with matplotlib, a RecursionError is raised due to the function entering an infinite loop. This is caused by an incorrect use of the matplotlib library which results in the function calling itself repeatedly, leading to a maximum recursion depth being exceeded.
code:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 

x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] 
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10] 

plt.plot(x, y) 
plt.
